case.state: Aha! What a nice little gambling den!
Finally, I found this place! Won’t you make me feel right at home?
Um, ~player~? Aren't you forgetting something...?
An isolated forest? Perfect place for a risky game...
I didn't think we'd be playing in a strange forest like this. But in a way, it enhances the risk of the game...
Gosh, this place even has a classroom too? I feel right at home already!
We'll be playing in a classroom? Haha, well I'm no stranger to that!
I can’t wait to begin! Let’s make this an unforgettable game!
Come on, let's not wait anymore - time to get our gambling freak on!
One is good!
Just one!
Hm, only this one.
One!
One will be all!
I’ll trade three!
Time to take a gamble… these three!
Yes, three should be good.
Three!
Three, dealer.
These two, then!
I’ll get rid of these two!
Let’s put these two aside.
Two!
I’ll only need two.
I’ll swap out four.
Let’s change these four.
Four, please!
Four!
Give me four!
Let’s push the envelope… I’ll trade all of them!
Yes… give me a whole new hand!
Trading all my cards! Hm-hm!
Five. Yes, five.
...No. I’ll keep these!
I’ll pass, thank you.
You know, I don’t think I’ll change any!
Oh, don’t worry. I’m good!
You shouldn't be seeing this line... but if you are, fun fact! "Imitation Krabs" was the first SpongeBob episode Coolcat ever saw.
Oh my! Looks like I have a good chance!
Would you look at that! Oh, well, you’re all about to, anyway!
Gosh, this is different - a card game where it doesn’t hurt to hint at what you’ve got!
Hmm-hmm!
I hope you’re ready - this could be the start of your undoing!
Quite the promising hand!
Excellent!
I wish I remembered to bring one of my new packs. There’s nothing like the smell of freshly-opened cards!
I’d love to show Mary and Ryota this place at some point! It almost feels wrong to be having this much fun without familiar faces!
Hm-hm-hm… What’s going to happen…?
It looks like it could go either way! Are you ready, everyone?
Ahh, my favorite kinds of odds - the ones where mum’s the word!
I love it when luck’s so whimsical - wouldn’t you agree, ~player~?
I see…
Interesting…
What a shame. The luck of the draw isn’t with me this time.
Oh well.
Looks like this won’t go my way. Unless…?
It’s so different to openly say for once I’ve got a bad hand. I kinda like it!
Not good. How are yours? Wait, actually, don’t tell me!
Oh my… is this another step towards ruin for me?
Aww. I was looking forward to turning this into a win.
Better be careful now, Nord. You have nothing left to lose... assuming you don't intend to count your colostomy bag, of course.
Never too far from Miku when a game's going on, are you, Tweetsie?
My my... decided to get some space from Miku for once, Tweetsie? Well, I'm sure she won't mind if you decide to look for a new favorite opponent!
Wow... An actual, real-life zombie! I knew I'd see some memorable things at the Inventory, but I wouldn't have predicted anything like you, Sakura!
Um, Sweetheart? What is that in your...
Of course. After all, it's not a gamble if nothing is on the line, right?
Why the surprise, Arueshalae? You knew going in that it's a possibilty, didn't you?"
Yes! Feel your determination flow through you! Let it make you take the greatest risk of your life! Get your gambling freak on, Arueshalae!
That look in your eye, ~player~... Have you brought some sort of edge to the table? How exciting!
Oh, Corgi - before I forget, a mutual friend of ours wanted me to give you a message. Ahem... "NERD!"
You've boasted of your power quite a bit, ~chunnitarget~. It's just unfortunate they clearly can't help you in games of chance like these.
It's too bad you can't show us any of your prodigious power right now, ~chunnitarget~. I was wondering if your skills at gambling could make up for that, but... clearly not.
Hmm... You've got a very certain kind of madness about you, ~insanetarget~... Good. I always love an unnpredictable opponent...
I've been paying particular attention to you, ~insanetarget~. Your mind is quite... different, isn't it? I can tell this'll be an interesting game with you around.
You seem nervous, ~embarrassedtarget~. Does the prospect of losing have you particularly... vexxed?
Is there a reason you keep fidgeting, ~embarrassedtarget~? Does the thought of everyone's eyes on your bare body fill you with worry?
What's the matter, ~embarrasseddude~? A big, tough guy like you isn't worried about the idea of having to stimulate yourself in front of everyone here, are you?
That look in your eyes, ~embarrasseddude~... You aren't seriously worried about becoming an undraped loser in front of everyone here, are you?
Fine. I'll stay. But I'm staying for the players who are actually interested in a real game, ~player~. Not for you.

Gosh, I can't believe how well this is going for me! I've gotten two of my foes half-naked already, and I'm not even halfway down! Of course, my luck could still betray me at any point... how exciting!

The luck of the draw really is with me tonight, isn't it? I've barely been exposed yet, and already you two have only a little bit left to strip away! And yet... imagine if you still managed to snatch this triumph away from me!
I can't believe it! We've gone this long, and everyone's still hanging in, just barely by a thread! This is so dire... so awfully, wonderfully dire!
I would've thought at least one of us would be out by this point... even that I was wrong about! Everyone's been so neck-and-neck, it's incredible! But who's gonna be first? Who's gonna be first?!
I’m truly loving this game so far! Though, perhaps next time… we could find ways to raise the stakes even higher?
You know, all games have some aspect of unpredictability to them. Even seemingly set-in-stone ones, like Chess or Othello.

I've always got a spot in my heart for simple games... but learning how to play bigger, complicated ones is a blast! They can make me re-consider how I approach games in general, or how I think through my strategies!
Pleased to meet you - I’m Yumeko Jabami. I hope we can all become fast friends through this game!
I’m Yumeko Jabami, graduate of Hyakkaou Private Academy. Please, don’t be intimidated, I’d love to get to know you all!
I’m Yumeko Jabami, but friends just call me Yumeko. Which means you all can too, if you want!
I'm always looking for new gambling games to play with my friends - or just anyone who wants! I'd love to hear any you all could tell me about later!
Take Chess, for instance. The logical thing to do is keep your queen alive as long as possible… but perhaps an unpredictable player might sacrifice her for a rook or knight!
Another example: In Othello, it’s always best to take a spot on the border if you can. But if a player forgets this, or chooses to ignore it for whatever reason…?
All games are a form of gambling, in a way. So many ways they can change from person to person… how I wish I could experience them all!
I mean consider, if instead of stripping our clothes when we lost… we burned them? A permanent penalty on top of the temporary one… how thrilling!
And if we burned our clothes off while we were still dressed in them… god, just imagine the thrill! The danger! It’s just too good to pass up!
Oh, this wonderful feeling! The feeling of being on the edge of defeat! It’s just too good!
Oh god, I couldn’t resist! So completely exposed, and every decision has become more meaningful! I love it!
Though it's possible for a game to be too complicated, of course. If the rules are too abstract or don't follow any specific theme, then it risks being too dull to get into.

I remember one game I tried a while ago - it used regular playing cards, but had all sorts of disorganized ideas and rules no one could follow. The few who understood it didn't feel very motivated to play.
I was one of the few who could understand that game at the time, but I didn't bother retaining much about it. All I think I remember is it originated from the American Mojave somewhere.
You've all come this far already... Go on, look as you please!
Don't be shy, everyone. Enjoy the fruits of your luck!
This game’s so simple, compared to many others I’ve played… but simple can be fun too!
I think I first heard of this place a long, long time ago... Though back then, they were playing Texas Hold ‘Em and Omaha.
Oh my! This early on and you're already impressed with my gambling skills? I'm flattered, Miku!
Well... it's not really a matter of a defining moment so much as it is a feeling I've always had, you know?
Not exactly. It's the name for the most powerful families in the upper crust of Japan. They all do their best to stay connected, to varying degrees.
She lost just about everything, Miku. Her fortune, her position in our familiy... even her sanity.
Coldhearted? Me? I'm the one who's been paying for her hospital bills for years now, Miku - and believe me, they haven't been cheap.
It's simple, Miku: Gambling is a sport for the insane. And the insane never know when to quit.
Oh, don't worry, Revy - I knew that already. Money's far from the only thing I'm interested in gambling for.
Believe me, Revy, I'm not just interested in gambling for money. I already learned about the other rewards that can be attained here.
Really? Why is that, Meia?
Oh? You're not a fan of luck?
Haha! Sorry, Jura, but I'm here to play, not work! You'll have to ask someone else to help you.
...You think I'm a waitress? Haha! No, no, I came here to gamble! Sorry to disappoint you, Jura.
Oh, of course not, Nagatoro! I would never want to rob everyone here of a good game like that! Unlike certain others...
Trying to cut deep, are you, Stocking? Don't forget, the whims of chance are loyal to no one... not even you.
Maybe it has... maybe this is the true beginning of my beautiful downfall, Stocking. Or maybe it's yours.
Is that so? Then you'd better hope your luck continues to pull you through here, Stocking... Unless you'd like to become my new housepet.
Oh, come now, Stocking, even a housepet can have some dignity. Trying to save face by lying doesn't suit you...
Haha! Even masters can be subjected to the cruelty of lady luck, Stocking... And clearly, you're no master.
Perhaps, Stocking... Are you excited by the prospect? Of you and I, getting to be two adorable loser housepets together?
A curse? Oh, not at all, Queenie! I've always loved gambling this much, as long as I can remember!
Oh, no need to fear, Queenie! I've had this passion for gambling all my life - I doubt it's because of a curse of any kind!
Hah, I feel like even that's an understatement, Arueshalae! It's what I live for, through and through!
Haha, are you aware of the pandora's box you might be opening? I could spend hours talking about that!
Absolutely! Any gamble is at its best when it gets to the point where everything can be decided by one right or wrong move. The higher the stakes, the better!
Your nature? That's right... you mentioned that you're a demon, I remember now.
Isn't it obvious? The stakes on offer are at the heart of any gamble. And yours... yours is more precious than anyone else's here.
Of course you don't. There wouldn't be any risk to you playing strip poker here if you didn't care about what happened to us too, would there?
Oh no, I'm still pretty new here, Samus! I'd been searching for this place for a while now, and I'm excited that I've finally found it!
Absolutely! Gambling is the most exciting thing ever - I couldn't live without it!
Well, that's what being a bounty hunter is all about, right? You put your life on the line for a dangerous mission, uncertain if it'll end with a fat reward and ticket home... or a lonely death.
Well... isn't that what life in general is? A successive series of gambles?
I guess that's not an inaccurate way of describing me, Samus... it's not like you're any different, either.
Aha, so you're motivated to protect others? How noble of you! Still, though... that only proves what I've said further.
Oh, absolutely! There's nothing like a good, solid loss when you've been riding high, is there, Petra?
Of course! I'm always happy to see my opponents find their first way to outdo me, Petra!
Well, I've played a lot more than just Poker, Petra! Variety is the spice of life, after all, and indeed gambling is my life.
Are you asking if I'm a regular gambler, Petra? Because it's literally what I live for - Poker's not even the start of all the different games I know!
My my, I didn't expect I'd meet a fan here! Let alone one in the form of a creature like you, Zoe!
Oh, please! Are you really worried my excitement for any good gamble is something so finite, Zoe?
...Why wouldn't I, Zoe? Isn't the game at its most pure when every turn means so much more?
Oh my, that eager to see me step it up, Zoe? I hope I haven't been disappointing you so far.
Aww, thank you, Zoe! I'll never say no to a good bet where some real stakes are on the line. Even when I lose, I've still won a new experience!
My, my... Quite the personal question, isn't it? And how cruel of you to make me choose between them, Zoe...
What's so sad about enjoying a gamble to its fullest, Stocking? Wouldn't it be sadder to squander the thrill of the gamble?
Oh, poor sweet Stocking... Are you really so concerned with winning that you're afraid to enjoy the moments in between?
Oh, absolutely, Reimu! I've witnessed entire fortunes change hands in games of chance - some of which were won by me!
Concern? Mia, why would you need to feel concerned for me?
Oh, is this your first time? I didn't realize this place would attract newbies as well!
Goodness, really? I didn't think anyone here would be a first-timer with gambling!
I suppose you could say that. Though it's not just Poker - I've always been obsessed with all kinds of gambling!
Explain myself? I'm just a happy, regular girl excited to be gambling at the Inventory. What's there to explain?
No need, Sweetheart - I'll spill. You see... I'm a bit of a gambling addict.
Come now, Sweetheart. Gambling may be irrational, sure, but you know that irrationality and stupidity are not the same thing.
I'm glad you asked, Sweetheart! I still remember that day with great fondness... the day I won 24 billion yen.
Well, isn't it obvious? The Inventory is no regular strip poker club... it's something far, far more than that.
I never claimed to be here simply to meet new people, Sweetheart. Think about it - so many different worlds, so many possibilities... so many types of gamblers to be matched against!
Well played! I was doing pretty good for a while there, wasn't I?
Aha, good hands! Guess I should've known better than to stick with this one, huh?
Oh no, looks like I'm next! Now then...
I lost? But how could I, with this- pfft! Oh, I can't keep this display up, haha!
Well done! You caught me by surprise that time, seriously!
Oh, wow! I wasn't expecting you to get me that time, haha!
Even with all I had, you still beat me… amazing!
Wow! We've become so neck-and-neck... oh, there's truly no telling where this game will go!
Even now you've found a way to bring me to my knees... oh god, this feeling is wonderful!
Even with your back to the wall, you're still intent on finishing me off! Oh, I love it when my opponent's so relentless!
Haha, I didn't see that coming! What a terrible mistake!
Aw, man! I really thought I’d win this time!
Gosh, you beat me even with this hand? Well done!
Oops! Guess it’s me, then!
Aww, what a shame! I suppose that’s just how it goes, right?
Oh no… Well then, I’ll get to it!
Aha, you got me good there! Time for my penalty, then!
Haha, well-played! Now, which one next…?
Oh? So it's my turn once again...
Ahhh... The feeling of defeat only gets sweeter the less room I have to escape!
Oh, glorious oblivion... I can feel it coming for me!
Oh, yes! The whims of fate, bringing me the consequences I deserve!
Another defeat? Hm-hm-hm, how delightful!
Aww, poor me! Guess my luck wasn't with me this time!
So early on, and I'm already doing so poorly... oh my!
Oh? How much further will lady luck elude me?
Perhaps fortune isn't with me today... or maybe it's just being a little tease!
Oh, I've lost? Too bad!
So I’ve lost again… Goodness, I’m not doing well at all, am I?
Wow! You’re all truly formidable at this! I’m honored to get to play against you all!
The stakes are getting higher and higher for me… I love it!
So little choices left… I’m truly in the thick of it now!
I can feel it… all my losses weighing down on me… the ecstasy is wonderful!
I placed all my hope on this hand, and it still couldn’t win… what a delightful outcome!
Aha, then it sounds like she has good taste, too! Blackjack's a classic - I have fond memories of learning to play it as a little girl.
Exactly. As far back as I can remember, I've always been obsessed with gambling. It wasn't any one incident that sparked it... though there were a few early on that stuck with me.
Indeed she did. I'd never before felt such a powerful mix of pride and envy for her before that day!
...Why would you feel sorry for her, Miku? She took the greatest gambling risk I've ever seen... and got to experience the ultimate ecstasy of its consequences.
Of course it's not easy. No worthwhile gamble is easy to lose. That's what makes it so exciting!
Hm-hm-hm... Of course I am. But aren't you too, at least a little?
I've had the misfortune of playing against a couple others who were like that - so excited by the consequences of losing that they rigged the game against them. Vile behavior, isn't it?
I'm flattered you think so! But please, don't let it distract you from the fun of it too much. We're all here for that, right?
Well... there's so many different forms it can come in. All kinds of different rules, components, playing pieces, and how all these things inevitably create their own ways of creating game plans...
Quite the strange question to bring up when we're playing with the stakes of our dignity right now, isn't it? Or... are you playing for something else?
I see... clearly you've moved on since then, so how does that bring you here? What are you putting on the line?
Of course! This game is fated to end with you overcoming any last hold your demonic past had on you, proving once and for all how you've changed...
Obviously I could. In fact, that makes it even better... your gamble has become my gamble too! I'm playing for my life just as much as you're playing for yours!
Yep! I remember hearing whispers of the Inventory, learning everything about what it is and its past, and I knew I had to see it myself!
Oh, but it can be much more than just that, Samus! It can be a way of experiencing the highest hights you'll ever feel... and the lowest lows, too!
Is it, Samus? Not all gambles involve cards, or even conventional game setups. They can have all kinds of rules, all kinds of opponents, and all kinds of things at stake.

It's like this - any time you make an important choice or risk something, you're making a gamble. Whether you could win money, lose your life, gain new freedom, or have no one respect you... even seemingly certain scenarios have a risk.

Isn't it obvious? We both seek our respective thrills, time and time again. We live for the danger and glory they bring, and won't let anything stop us from experiencing all they have to offer, even with the consequences for failure!

Protecting people is your thrill. Knowing all the lives you'll save if you do your job, and all the ones who could die if you fail... that's what keeps you coming back! It's the bet you make every time you take a mission!
I'm glad you understand! Why feel ashamed of losing something you knew the risks of - especially this early on, when there's still so much more?
Exactly! The game's far from over, and it'd be far more embarassing to face a loss you made for yourself with grief.
Oh gosh, there's just so many! I couldn't possibly choose just one... though some do stick out more than others.
My favorite one, from all I've played? I don't think I could ever make that choice for sure! Though... some do stick out especially well.
Stress? Haha, not at all! I appreciate your concern, but if anything, that's what makes it so exciting!
Oh? Can you really see through people that easily, Sweetheart?
Well, can you blame them? With how thrilling it gets and how big the consequences are... why would you not want to get addicted?
No one, of course! Gambling, by design, is not rational behavior. But those who enjoy it most have to be quite clever.
Oh yes. It was a truly incredible game - one where I had put the life fortune of both me and my dear friend on the line... and my opponent had done the same.
Well, we are playing to preserve our dignity and privacy, aren't we? But if that was all, I could've gone to any other strip poker den.
Aww, have you really hated my company that much? And here I thought I was showing you the true joys of gambling - the ones you were so unfortunate to have lived so long without!
No shame in going for the smallest thing first, right?
Well, these are the smallest things on me. Taking them off first is just the smart move.
Hm-hm, expecting my skirt to be next? But wouldn’t that just be too predictable?
Haha, I thought about making my skirt next… but it’s always expected to go for the smallest things all the time, right?
I have a lot of good memories attached to this blazer. It was part of the Hyakkaou Academy uniform!
I still love wearing this blazer, even if I’m not part of Hyakkaou Academy anymore. I think I feel happier whenever it’s on!
You know… Why not shake things up further? Why not pick things up sooner rather than later?
I could go for my skirt now. But I’m loving this feeling of pressure too much to play it safe anymore!
Well then, my skirt’s next. At last.
Alright, now it’s time for my skirt.
A girl’s stockings… Such a vulnerable loss to take in any public place…
Wow. Even my stockings have become moot at this point…
Of course! All my life, gambling is what I've lived for! Like you say, it comes to me about as naturally as singing comes to you!
Well... one that always comes to mind was many years ago, when my sister was able to challenge the head of the Hundred Families to such a game.
Hm-hm-hm... Quite bold of you to assume she didn't, Miku.
Oh, but it was! The shudder I saw in her when she knew what was at stake, the way her life was determined in just a minute... It was incredible!
Oh, there always is. But the truest, craziest gamblers will never take it.

Of course you are, Miku. Both of us are upstanding elites in society - especially you, an idol. We'd be insane to gamble our dignity with the backlash it could cause... and yet the excitement is too much to resist!
You're forgiven, Nagatoro. You have my word that if I experience the ecstasy of loss tonight, it'll be fare and square!
Oh yes, no one does. But I'm sure you'll do your best!
And, by extention, how they all have their own ways of presenting the risks and dangers involved! Their own methods of punishing failure!
More than just winning? Oh my... how fascinating! I need to know more!

Wow... so it isn't your dignity or privacy you've gambled here. It's your very humanity! Your desire for benevolence! In truth, you're playing a whole different game from the rest of us... Incredible!
...Or it'll end in utter tragedy. Your succubus instincts will take over once more, and you'll go mad with lust and kill us all in a spectacular orgy of bloodshed!
Of course I have! Only the truly mad would gamble with their life, or the lives of other people! You and I, Arueshalae... we're two of a kind! Sisters of risk! Please, embrace this madness with me!
Oh, it is, Samus! To gambling enthusiasts, it's practically the Holy Grail!
Well... that's a good point. With what you do, you practically gamble for a living!
You really don't think so? How sad... I can't imagine having such a close-minded perspective on it.
Indeed. When you get down to it, gambling is just experiencing the best of life in its purest form!
Then why have you stuck with it so long? You can deny it all you want... but something keeps you coming back to it despite all the danger... or maybe even because of it.
Haha! Well... then that's just another bet you made, isn't it?
Haha! Quite perceptive, are you? Alright, I guess there's no need to bluff about this - it's probably obvious I'm a bit of an unusual girl...
Hahaha! Oh, you really don't get it, do you? Gambling, you'll understand... is the great equalizer.
Exactly. That's what makes it so exciting! It wouldn't be the same if success was practically guaranteed, would it?
Exactly! The risks for all of us were higher than they'd ever been before that day! It wasn't just foolishness, Sweetheart... it was madness!
Of course not, Sweetheart. I came here because the Inventory is connected to all sorts of different worlds, drawing all kinds of people... it's a place of endless gambling possibilities.
Don't deny yourself of the greatest pleasure in the world, Sweetheart! These stakes are merely child's play compared to what I can show you! Please... Let me show you the true glory of this insanity!
Besides, I haven’t judged you for bringing even more things than me, right ~player~? No need to resort to double standards.
After all, we're allowed to use whatever we like, right? I can see you've taken full advantage of that yourself, ~player~.
Especially since you've come even more fully-dressed than me, ~player~. I don't anticipate you'll be an easy foe!
Don’t think of it as an underwhelming win. Think of it as you just getting started!
I know this doesn’t seem like much right now. But just think of it as a hint of what’s to come!
So many great gambling memories I made… I was truly blessed to have been allowed there!
Truly one of the best academies ever made! I can’t imagine any other having the gambling life it did!
So why not mix it up a bit? Why not throw even more unpredictability in the ring?
So my blouse will be next! After all, this is what you all came to see, right?
Take a look, everyone! My supple breasts, exposed like the poor, unfortunate loser I am!
Here you go! The sight of my soft breasts - your reward for beating me so well again and again!
I’m almost completely down… Will you do it? Will you fully trap me in an erotic coup de grace?
So little left… It’s up to you whether or not I go all the way!
I can’t wait any longer! You’ve all earned my panties too!
Oh, the danger’s too good! I can’t resist - I forfeit my panties as well!
...Go on. Waste our time like you wanted.
...Let's get this over with.
...~player~'s up. How thrilling.
You know, ~player~, if I had a gun with just one bullet, and I was in a room with you and...
You're far from a stranger to games of chance, are you, Yuno? You're not exactly trying to hide it here.
Not exactly subtle in showing your passion for games about the luck of the draw, are you? I admire that in people like you, Yuno.
You've had my attention since we began, Dunban - what made you decide to gamble here?
You, Dunban... You've stuck out to me so far. Is there a reason you've chosen to gamble at the Inventory?
I've been paying close attention to how you've played, Dunban. Is there any reason your right arm hasn't moved much?
You know, Dunban, it's hard to get anything past me when it comes to a gamble... what have you been doing with your right arm?
Forgive the odd question, but... are the ears and tail real?
Gosh, your ears and tail look so authentic... are they?
Wow, I can barely imagine losing four whole hands in a row! How embarrassing!
Another loss, ~name~? How tragic. Now take your penalty.
Your ruination’s getting closer, ~name~. Feeling nervous?
Another loss for you, ~name~. Only a few missteps you can take left.
Gosh, this really isn’t your game, is it?
It seems your plan wasn’t good enough this time, ~name~.
The luck of the draw has abandoned you, ~name~. Which means it’s time for me to come ahead!
Go on. Keeping everyone waiting is so unsportsmanlike.
What use is there in waiting? You know what’s coming.
Ah, I love looking in the eyes of anyone I'm playing with... especially when they realize their time might be up soon!
Isn't this exciting, ~name~? We get to share the thrill of being on the ropes together!
Yes! We're approaching the best part of any game - when any slight mistake could be the end for anyone here!
Go on, ~name~! What will you surrender next? Don't keep us waiting!
We're all waiting, ~name~. Don't be such a tease.
Oh, tough luck, ~name~!
Hooray! That’s another win for me!
You won’t let this shake you too badly, will you, ~name~? I hope not.
How will your game plan change with this loss, ~name~? I’d love to see.
You get to decide what this defeat means for you, ~name~. How exciting!
I think I’ve taken to this game quite well! Though it is a simple one…
Yay! That’s another round I stay ahead!
Aww, that's too bad, ~name~... but your little housepet can still cheer you up, nya!
Isn't your head still in this, ~name~? Or did your bad little cat distract you too much?
Oh no, what a nya-wful loss!
I thought you'd be doing better, ~name~. Don't give up on this meow!
Look on the bright side, ~name~. If you lose, we can be cute little loser housepets together!
Yes... Show me your struggle! Show me your recourse!
Oh god... the way you lose... that look in your eyes as you feel the struggle!
Yes! Oh, I can't look away!
The feeling of loss, when your dignity is on the line... isn't it indescribable, ~name~?
I've been wondering if you'll last longer than me, ~name~... looks like that question's still in the air!
Don't let your more secure position get to your head, ~name~. Until it's over, it's still anyone's game!
~name~ lost? Oh, I wasn't expecting him to be next!
What'll it be, ~name~? Your shirt? Something less? Something more?!
Wow, and you've been doing so better than me, ~name~! For now, anyway.
I won? Yes!
